Privacy Policy â€‹

Last updated: March 23th 2024 - changelog â€‹


What data do I collect? â€‹

By default â€‹

  • I do not collect any data
  • I do not sell any data
  • I do not share any data

  • I do not log traffic
  • I do not use any type of analytics
  • I do not use any type of tracking
  • I do not use any type of browser fingerprinting

  • ğŸ”„ Cloudflare Proxy is âŒ DISABLED

Piped â€‹

  • I only collect the following essential data in case you have created an account. Obviously, these are only used to enable account creation and you can delete your account at any time through Piped's settings menu.

    • username
    • password (hashed)
    • channel subscriptions
    • playlists

  • ğŸ”„ Cloudflare Proxy is âœ… ENABLED

SafeTwitch, RedLib and Nitter â€‹

  • ğŸ”„ Cloudflare Proxy is âœ… ENABLED

Third Parties â€‹

  • This website, Piped, SafeTwitch and RedLib are hosted on a server provided by Netcup. Their privacy policy
  • All other services are hosted on a server provided by Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. Their privacy policy
  • Cloudflare is used for CDN and security (only on subdomains where Cloudflare Proxy is enabled). Cloudflare may log traffic that looks suspicious. These WAF logs include: IP Address, User Agent and Query. These WAF logs are discared after 14 days. Their privacy policy
  • Crowdsec is used for security. Crowdsec is open source and runs locally. If it detects abuse, it will report the IP address in question to Crowdsec Threat Intelligence. Their privacy policy
